alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 15 at 2:58PM EST until January 17 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 possible. * WHERE...Coastal Jefferson, Coastal Taylor and Coastal Dixie Counties. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor
